user.title: Connect Google Nest x Yale
user.description: Paste your Issue Token URL and Cookies from your Nest web session.

data.har_json: HAR JSON or cURL (optional — paste DevTools ‘Save all as HAR…’ or ‘Copy as cURL’)

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Google Nest x Yale is allowed.

error.auth_failure: Authentication failed. Please verify the Issue Token URL and Cookies.
error.invalid_har: HAR content could not be parsed. Ensure you pasted the full HAR JSON.
error.missing_values: HAR did not contain the required information (issueToken and cookies).
error.unknown_error: Unknown error. Check logs for details.
